36 13/16 x 20 1/2 in. (93.5 x 52 cm) (image)
74 x 26 in. (188 x 66 cm) (mount) W 69 cm w/roller
marks: Signature; Stamps LRC: [日本畫梅翁軒永春筆] {Nihonga Baiōken Eishun hitsu}
medium: Hanging scroll; ink, color, and gofun on paper
text: The courtesan's black uchikake is patterend with shikishi poem cards inscribed with calligraphy in white and gold. She is fixing her hair with both while a kamuro, standing beside her, is offering a comb.
title: Standing Courtesan Fixing Her Hair with the Help of an Attendant
